/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green against the backdrop of the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. In the distance, buildings rise, their details softened by the distance. The image is taken from a low angle, emphasizing the height of the trees and the buildings, and creating a sense of depth and scale. The colors in the image are vivid, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
